editionStmt.p: Record edited by Charles LI CNRS, CEIAS, UMR 8564.

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits.

summary.p:
This manuscript, consisting of two folios, contains three Vaiṣṇava devotional works:
Rūpacintāmaṇi
Guruparamparā
Vṛndādevīstava The name of each work has been written in the left margin.
The Rūpacintāmaṇi is the first and longest of the three, and it is also the only one which contains a colophon at the end, dating it to Śaka 1742, or 1820/1821 AD.

The Guruparamparā consists of four numbered verses, preceded by three introductory verses which are attributed to the Padmapurāṇa. Together, these seven verses also appear as part of the maṅgalācaraṇa of the Prameyaratnāvalī.

The Vṛndādevīstava consists of eight verses in praise of Vṛndādevī, followed by one final, concluding verse, where it is called the Vṛndādevyaṣṭaka. Compared to the other two texts, this one has been copied with the most errors, indicating that may have been written from memory.

collation.desc: Bengali foliation, right margin. 1v foliated as 1, 2r foliated as 2.
Bengali foliation, right margin. 2v foliated as 1.

additions.desc: Shelfmark on front cover, in pencil.
Shelfmark on folded strip of paper: Scr. 1426. Old shelfmark, 98 and title, Rūpacintāmaṇi in smaller letters. 40 x 122 mm.
Title of first text on 1v and 2r: rūpacintāmaṇi ―.

Title of second and third texts on 2v:
śrīguruparamparā ―
śrīvṛndādevīstava ―
On 2v, top-left corner: śrīrāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ and śrīrādhākṛṣṇābhyāṃ namaḥ ||
BIBLIOTHEQUE NATIONALE MSS R.F. stamp, 1v and 2r.

acquisition.p: Part of the non-medical manuscripts of the Palmyr Cordier collection.

listBibl.bibl: Bāladeva Vidyābhūṣaṇa, K. D. Vedāntavāgīśa, A. K. S. Śāstrī, & G. S. Śarmā (1927). Prameyaratnāvalī: Gauḍīyavaiṣṇavadarśanaprakaraṇagranthaḥ. Calcutta: Sanskrit Sahitya Parisat.
Cabaton, Antoine (1907-1908). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits sanscrits avec supplément manuscrit. Paris: E. Leroux. Supplemented by Jean Filliozat. 315.

encodingDesc.p: ❈ denotes a puṣpikā. ẏ denotes a y with a nukta dot, following ISO 15919. Spaces added in transcription where possible.

lg.l:
candrārddhaṃ kanasaṃ trikoṇadhanuṣī khaṃ goṣpadaṃ proṣṭhikāṃ śaṅkhaṃ savyapade 'tha dakṣiṇapade ko
ṇāṣṭhakaṃ svastikaṃ |
catruṃ chatraẏavāṅkuśaṃ dhvajapavī jambūrddhvarekhāmbujaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ harim ūnaviṃśatimahālakṣmācitāṅghriṃ bhaje || 1 ||

chatrāari athāt__ cakre 2ridvaja
vallipuṣpavalayān_ padmorddhvarekhāṅkuśān arddhenduñ ca ẏavaṃ ca vāmam anu ẏā śaktiṃ gadāṃ syaathāt__ rathaḥ 3ndanaṃ |

vedīkuṇḍalamatsyaparvvatadaraṃ dhatte nv asa
vyaṃ padaṃ tāṃ rādhāṃ ciram ūnaviṃśatimahālakṣmācitāṅghriṃ bhaje || 2 ||

kalindātmajoāveṣṭite mañjuvṛndāvane kuñjapuñjāvṛtasvarṇṇa
bhūmau |
maṇikuṭṭimāntarmahāyogapīṭhe sphurattuṅgakalpadrumūle sugandhau || 3 ||

atibhrājirātnā 5ravindacchadālīsthitālīsthitau
ẏau kiśorau vibhātiḥ |
tayor ādimat__syāmbudābhasya nityaṃ smara tvaṃ mano mañjulaṃ mandahāsyaṃ || 4 ||

lasadbarhaguñjāñcitāṃ cārucū
ḍāṃ suvakrālakāṃś citrakārccir lalāṭaṃ |
bhruvau locane nāśikāṃ svacchagaṇḍau śrutidvandvam udyanmaṇīkuṇḍalāḍhyaṃ || 5 ||

suśoṇādha
ro ṣṭhau smitānvāsya vṛttaṃ trirekhāñcikaṇṭhaṃ mṛḍuskandhayugmaṃ |

bhujāv āyatau sāṅgadau bhūṣaṇāḍhyau karāv aṅguliḥ sormmikā
lakṣmarekhāṃ || 6 ||
uraḥkaustubhaṃ svarṇṇamuktādihārān śriyaṃ brahmarekhāṃs tanorddhve pradīptāṃ |

lasattuṅgalomāvalīnābhipadmaṃ kṛ
ṣaṃ madhyamaṃ kiṅkinī pītavāsaḥ || 7 ||
supīnor uyugjānujaṅghāntagulphadvayādho raṇannūpurau pādapadme |

mano ṅgāṅguliḥ śvetaśo
ṇānnakhāṃs tattalāruṇyam āpārṣṇibibhrājamānaṃ || 8 ||
athāṅguṣṭhamūle yavāryyātapatraṃ tanuṃ tarjjaṇīsandhibhāgūrddharekhāṃ |

padārddhvāva
dhiṃ kuñcitāṃ madhyamādho 'mbujaṃ tattalasthaṃ dhvajaṃ sat__patākaṃ || 9 ||
kaniṣṭhātane tv aṅkuśaṃ vajram eṣāṃ tanesvastikānāṃ catuṣkaṃ caturbhiḥ |
yutaṃ jambubhir madhyabhātā2gā1ṣṭhakoṇaṃ mano re smara śrīharer dakṣiṇāṅghrau || 10 ||

anāmātalekhaṃ smarāṅguṣṭhamūle daraṃ taddvayā
dho dhanur jyāvihīnaṃ |
tato goṣpadaṃ tattale tu trikoṇaṃ catuskumbham arddhendumīnau ca vāme || 11 ||

talaṃ śoṇimāktaṃ nakhān_ śvetara
ktān_ mṛduśonapārṣṇī pade nūpurāḍhyoe |
lasadgulphajaṅghoruparvvoruyugmaṃ taḍitpītavāso maṇikiṅkinīyuka || 12 ||

kṛṣaṃ madhya
maṃ nābhipadmaṃ gabhīraṃ tanuṃ romarājīdalābhodarasthāṃ |

uro vistṛtaṃ kaustabhaṃ lambihārān_ srajaṃ śrītulasyās tanorddhve tu
vāse || 13 ||
śriyaṃ dakṣiṇe brahmalakṣmatrirekhāṃ śvarāṇāṃ januḥ kambukaṇṭhaṃ suvṛttaṃ |

mṛdutuṅgamaṃśadvayaṃ sthūlaphullau bhujau sā
ṅgadau kāntipūrṇṇau kaphoṇī || 14 ||
maṇibandhabhūṣāñcitaṃ hastayugmaṃ mahālakṣmaretiraktau tu pāṇī |

suvarṇṇormmikā aṅgulī
s tannakhendun_ mukhaṃ dīptadantādharoṣṭhākṣigaṇḍaṃ || 15 ||

sunāsābhruvau rocanācitrakārccir lalāṭaṃ śrutisañcalat__kuṇḍalā
ḍhye |
kacān_ kuñcitān_ piñcṛguñchāprasūnaiḥ śritāṃ cārucūḍāṃ sphuranmandahāsyaṃ || 16 ||

vṛndāvane ẏau rasikau vibhātaḥ pa
raṣparaḥ premasudhārasāḍhyau |
tayos taḍinnindirucaḥ kiśoryyā līlāṃśukāntaḥ smara mandahāsyaṃ || 17 ||

veṇīkṛtān_ ku
ñcitān_ sūkṣmakeśān_ cūḍāmaṇimañjulapatrapāśyāṃ |
vakrālakan_ sattilakaṃ lalāṭaṃ bhruvau dṛśārañjanarañjitābhiḥ || 18 ||
śrutidvayaṃ kuṇḍalamañju cakrīśalākike gaṇḍatale makamakaryyau |

nāsāṃ sumuktām aruṇādharoṣṭhau dantārcciṣaḥ saccibukaṃ
sabinduṃ || 19 ||
kaṇṭhatrirekhāṃ kramalambamānān_ hārān natāṃsau bhujasāṅgadatvaṃ |

kaphonike kaṅkaṇacūḍikāḍhye sulakṣma
rekhāruṇapāṇipadme || 20 ||
ratnormmikā aṅgulikā nakhaśrīśritāḥ kucau kañculikāruṇābha |

niskan dalābhodararomapaṅkti
nābhiṃ kṛṣaṃ madhyam utaṃ trivalyā || 21 ||
citrāntarīyaparinīlasāṭīm urudvayaṃ jānuyugañ ca jaṅgho

gulphadvayaṃ haṃsakanūpura
śrībhūtormmikā aṅgulikā nakhāś ca || 22 ||
are manaś cintaya rādhikāyā vāme padāṅguṣṭhatale yavāri |

pradesinī sandhita
ūrddharekhām ākuñcitām ācaraṇārddham eva || 23 ||
madhyātale bjadhvajapuṣpavallīḥ kaniṣṭhikādho 'ṅkuśam ekam eva |

cakrasya mūle
valayātapatre pārṣṇo tu candroārddham athānyapāde || 24 ||
pārṣṇau ruṣaṃ syandanaśailam ūrddhve tat__pārśvayoḥ śaktigade ca śaṅkhaṃ |
aṅguṣṭhamūle 'tha kaniṣṭhikādho vedīmadhyoḥ kuṇḍalam eva tasyā || 25 ||

pados tale pārṣṇiyugañ ca śoṇaṃ raktormmikā ra
ktanākhāṅguliś ca |
mañjīrayugmaṃ tanugulphajaṅghājānūruśobhā jaghanaṃ nitambaṃ || 26 ||

vāsaḥ sasūtraṃ maṇimekhalāñ ca nā
bhiṃ dalābhodararomavallyau |
pīnau kucau kañculikāñcitau ca kaṇṭhaṃ trirekhaṃ maṇihemahārān || 27 ||

skandhau latāv aṅga
dinau bhujau śrībharau kapholī maṇibandhayugmaṃ |
vicitracūḍāmaṇikaṅkaṇāḍhyaṃ śoṇe karābje mṛḍulāṅguliś ca || 28 ||
ratnormmikās tā sunakhendukhaṇḍān_ saśyāmabinduṃ cibukaṃ mukhābjaṃ |

oṣṭhādharau gaṇḍayugaṃ sucitraṃ karṇṇollasat__kuṇḍala
ciakrikāḍhyau || 29 ||
nāsāṃ maṇimauktikabhūṣitāṃ dṛgadvayaṃ lasat__kajvalam ujvalantau |

bhruvaṃ lalāṭaṃ tilakaṃ śrīpatrapāśyāṃ
suvakrālakalolimānaṃ || 30 ||
sīmantarekhāṃ smara cittacūḍāmaṇiprasūnāvaligumphacitrāṃ

veṇīṃ triveṇīm iva bandha
pāśyā virājad agrām atha mandahāsyaṃ || 31 ||
śrīrādhikāmādhavarūpacintāmaṇau mano dvitrir atho catur vvā |

āvarttayed ẏo
dhṛtimān paṭhan_ sa prāpnoti taddarśanam āśu sākṣāt || 32 || ❈ ||

lg.l: saṃpradāyavihīnaye mantras te viphalāmatāḥ |
tataḥ kalau bhaviṣyanti catvāraḥ sampradāyinaḥ ||

śrī1brahma2rudra3✗
sanakā4 vaiṣṇavāḥ kṣitipāvanāḥ |
catvāram te kalau bhāvyā hy ut__kale puruṣottamā ||
rāmānujaśrīsvīcakre madhvācāryyaṃ caturmmukhaḥ |
śrīviṣṇusvāminaṃ rudro nimbāditvacatuḥsanaḥ ||
śrīkṛṣṇa1brahma2devarṣi3bādarāyaṇa4saṅgakānā_ |

śrīmādhva5
śrīpadmanābha6śrīmannṛhari7mādhavān8 || 1 ||
akṣobhya9jayatīrtha10śrījñānasindhu11dayānidhiīn12 |

śrīvidyānidhirājendrajayadharmmān_ kramā
d vayaṃ || 2 ||
puruṣomabrahmaṇyavyāsatīrthaś ca saṃstumaḥ |
tato lakṣmīpatiśrīmanmādhavendrañ ca bhaktidaḥ || 3 ||

tacchiṣyān_ śrīśvarādvaita
nityānandajagadgurun |
devam īśvaraśiṣyaṃ śrīcaitanyañ ca bhajāmy ahaṃ || 4 ||

satataiśvaryyayuktāṃ tāṃ
vṛndādeviṃ namāmy ahaṃ || 1 ||
divyadevataror mūle vicitramaṇimandire |
ratnasiṃhāsanāśināṃ vṛndādeviṃ namāmy ahaṃ || 2 ||

divyakāñcagaurā
ṅgīṃ vicitritavarāmbarāṃ |
pūrṇacandranibhāsyāṃ tāṃ vṛndādeviṃ namāmy ahaṃ || 3 ||
vedopaniṣadais tatvai brahmādyair amarair api |

surarṣibhiś ca saṃ
pūjyāṃ vṛndādeviṃ namāmy ahaṃ || 4 ||
śrīgovindaprasādais tair gandhamālyaprasūnakai |
bhūṣaṇe bhūṣitāṅgi ca vṛndādeviṃ namāmy ahaṃ || 5 ||

ẏaṃ ẏaṃ
bhāvaṃ hṛdi jñātvā tāṃ tāṃ līlāṃ manoharāṃ |
sāmagrīṃ ẏojayantiṃ tāṃ vṛndādeviṃ namāmy ahaṃ || 6 ||

kandarpakoṭiramyāṃ tāṃ rādhākṛṣṇādbhuta
śrīyaṃ |
dṛṣṭvā magnacakorakṣiṃ vṛndādeviṃ namāmy ahaṃ || 7 ||
vṛṣabhānusutā kāntā kṛṣṇapremapariplutā |

pulakai pūritāṃ nitvāṃ vṛndade
viṃ namāmy ahaṃ || 8 ||
ẏaḥ paṭhet 1 prātarahṇāya vṛndādevyaṣṭakaṃ śubhaṃ |
